API name: Global Forest Watch REST API v1
Description: The Global Forest Watch API allows developers to retrieve information on forest change measures, including cover loss, tree cover gain, and disturbances. Specific data that developers can retrieve includes University of Maryland tree cover loss & gain, FORMA (FORest Monitoring for Action) alerts, IMAZON SAD (Deforestation Alert System) alerts, QUICC (Quarterly Indicator of Cover Change) alerts, and NASA active fires.
